set-up-project-form.title: Set up configuration for {repositoryName}
set-up-project-form.name-field-placeholder: Give a name to your {repositoryName} configuration
set-up-project-form.config-format-file-path-field-label: Path to your configuration format file
set-up-project-form.branch-field-placeholder: On which branch should we find the file?

errors.empty-name: You must provide a name for your configuration
You must provide a name for your environment

api-keys.title: API Keys
api-keys.message: API Keys are unique to an environment. An API key is required to fetch your configuration from your application running environment.

delete.title: Delete this environment
delete.message: Once you delete an environment, there is no going back. Please be certain.

confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm.message: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {environmentName} environment, its configuration values and its api keys.
confirm.button-label: I understand the consequences, delete this environment

errors.unknown: An unknown error happened. Please try again later.
